title: Middle class in Iran hostile to clergy

content.question: Which of the following statements is most accurate about the middle class in Iran?

choices.label: The middle class in Iran consists mainly of clerics and other religious officials.
The middle class in Iran is culturally westernized and often hostile to the clergy.
The middle class in Iran is very small and found in predominantly rural areas.
The middle class in Iran controls the media and is very influential in national decision making.
The middle class in Iran is almost non-existent.

content.answer: The middle class in Iran is culturally westernized and often hostile to the clergy.
